title: Timothy Caulfield - Healthy Debate
author: Lia
cleaned_text: Contributor Timothy Caulfield is an author and Canada Research Chair in Health Law and Policy, University of Alberta. Our information ecosystem has become a massive false-balance machine. We need a more accurate representation of science and to correct misrepresentations wherever they emerge. We are seeing a strange revisionist spin on the issue of misinformation. But misinformation has done and is continuing to do serious harm. It is killing us. Please, Alternative Medicine, stop using untrue assertions to justify your existence. You can't fix the problems of the conventional system with unproven therapies and misinformation.
